collection.title: 1. Personal Data Collection
collection.intro: Prospio collects the following data in the context of its services:
collection.id: Identification data: name, first name, email address, phone number
collection.connection: Connection data: IP address, browser type, access times
collection.prospecting: Prospecting data: information collected via scraping (with consent)

purpose.title: 2. Purposes of Processing
purpose.service: Providing our prospecting and CRM services
purpose.communication: Communicating with you regarding your account
purpose.legal: Complying with our legal and regulatory obligations

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your data on the following legal bases:
legalBasis.consentDesc: : for scraping and sending commercial communications
legalBasis.legitimateDesc: : to improve our services and prevent fraud

retention.title: 4. Data Retention
retention.intro: Your data is retained for the following periods:
retention.customer: Customer data: during the contract term and 3 years after termination
retention.prospecting: Prospecting data: maximum 1 year (unless explicit consent)
retention.technical: Technical data: 13 months for connection logs
retention.marketing: Marketing data: 3 years after last contact

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.intro: We only share your data with:
sharing.providers: Our technical service providers (hosting, API providers)
sharing.noSale: We never sell your personal data to third parties.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.accessDesc: : to know the data we hold about you
rights.deletionDesc: : to delete your data (right to be forgotten)
rights.limitationDesc: : to limit the processing of your data
rights.portabilityDesc: : to receive your data in a readable format
rights.oppositionDesc: : to object to the processing of your data
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@prospio.app

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.intro: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data:
security.training: Regular staff training on data protection

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.management: You can manage your preferences through your browser settings.

modifications.title: 9. Modifications
modifications.intro: We reserve the right to modify this policy at any time. Changes will take effect as soon as they are published on the site. We will inform you of significant changes by email.
